description:
ld: only set SNOPTRBSS during load

dodata will convert to SNOPTRDATA if appropriate.
Should fix arm build (hope springs eternal).

messages.text:
Hello golang-dev (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://go.googlecode.com/hg/

*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=5d3f04419f11 ***

ld: only set SNOPTRBSS during load

dodata will convert to SNOPTRDATA if appropriate.
Should fix arm build (hope springs eternal).

TBR=golang-dev
CC=golang-dev
http://codereview.appspot.com/5687074

subject: code review 5687074: ld: only set SNOPTRBSS during load
